content:
DereferenceAlias Enum

Definition

The DereferenceAlias enumeration specifies how aliases are resolved. This enumeration provides values for the stem.DirectoryServices.DirectorySearcher.DerefAlias* property.

In this Article

public enum DereferenceAlias
Inheritance
Object
ValueType
System.Enum
DereferenceAlias

Fields

Always

Dereferences aliases when both searching subordinates and locating the base objects of the search.
FindingBaseObject

Dereferences aliases when locating the base object of the search, but not when searching its subordinates.
InSearching

Dereferences aliases when searching subordinates of the base object, but not when locating the base itself.
Never

Indicates that the alias will not be dereferenced. If the stem.DirectoryServices.DirectorySearcher.DerefAlias* property is not set, the default value is Never.
